params.mappingId: The mapping to add the rule to

returns.mapped: Placeholder return of the input record

params.index: The zero-based index of the rule
params.mappingId: The mapping the rule belongs to

returns.valid: Whether the mapping has at least one rule

addRule(bytes32,string,string,string).notice: Add a translation rule to a mapping

applyMapping(bytes32,string).notice: Apply a mapping to a record (emits event; actual transformation is off-chain)

createMapping(bytes32,string,string,stri.notice: Create a new field mapping between source and destination schemas

getRule(bytes32,uint256).notice: Retrieve a rule within a mapping by index

validate(bytes32).notice: Validate that a mapping has rules defined
